review: Bought this for my parents for Christmas so they could cut their cable bill. They love it, especially the voice remote. It took awhile to teach them how to use it but they are now very happy to be spending only a small fraction of the amount they used to pay for TV. It also is linked to my Amazon account so they have to consult with me before making purchases (there is a pin code required), which helps them to avoid accidental spending. My dad now spends hours on YouTube watching True Facts videos and my mum marathons her favorite shows on Netflix, Prime, and Hulu. They initially griped about the lack of sports but I showed my dad how to subscribe to the NHL app and Sling TV and he's happy. And hey, more excuses to go to Buffalo Wild Wings! The only thing I didn't like was that there wasn't a way for me to download apps for some of our local channels.The days of fighting over who gets to have the remote to mute commercials are finally over. And my mum no longer ignores me during her favorite shows since she can just pause them. Well worth the money. Even convinced them to finally upgrade from their previous bulky TV that was so old that it didn't even have an HDMI port. Since they wouldn't let me buy it for them, I had to calculate out how long it would take them to save up enough to buy a brand new TV from their savings from cable (2 months) and they were convinced. No more breaking their backs moving the old TV.Amazon Fire TV has really improved my life even though I didn't buy it for me. Thanks!
author: Caate
